await gra.gravatars(0)
await gra.createGravatar('OORT', 'https://oortech.com')

await grav.updateGravatarImage('https://oortech.com')
await grav.updateGravatarImage('Oachis', 'https://oortech.com')
await grav.updateGravatar('Oachis', 'https://oortech.com')
await grav.createGravatar('test', 'https://oortech.com')
await grav.createGravatar('Oachis', 'https://oortech.com')

await gravatar.createGravatar('Oachis', 'https://oortech.com/)
gravatar
await gravatar.deployed

const gravatar = ethers.getContractAt("GravatarRegistry", "0x5FbDB2315678afecb367f032d93F642f64180aa3")
